column3: $Managers: Gil Hodges (NL New York), Earl Weaver (AL Baltimore); For the first time since 1957, fans chose position starters Weaver and Hodges chose the other 40 players; Sixth AS Extra-inning game, all won by NL; eighth straight NL win; MVP: Carl Yastrzemski (Boston)
$homer in first All-Star at bat for Dick Dietz
